alert.note: Alert for Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Clay, northwestern Otter Tail, northeastern Wilkin and southwestern Becker Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Muskoda, or 18 miles east of Fargo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perham, Barnesville, Pelican Rapids, Lake Lida, Rothsay, Star Lake and Big McDonald Lake. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 5 and 46. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
